definition[0]: someone who lives next to you or near you
example[0]: One of the neighbors complained about the noise from the party.
example[1]: FBI agents were interviewing all their friends and neighbors.
example[2]: Our next-door neighbours  (=the people who live in the house next to us) say they’ll look after our cat for us while we’re away.
definition[1]: a country that is next to another one
definition[2]: someone or something that is next to another person or thing of the same type
example[4]: The teacher saw Phil passing a note to his neighbour.
example[5]: The garden was divided from its neighbour by a high wall.
